alert.note: Alert for Taylor (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 11 at 3:42AM CST until March 13 at 12:00AM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Another Round of Snow Expected Today Through Sunday... .A band of light to moderate snow moves late this afternoon, persisting through Sunday. The potential for higher snowfall accumulations Sunday afternoon in Central Wisconsin continues, but the exact location of this snow band remains in question. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON TO 1 AM CDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Widespread total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches with locally higher amounts possible. * WHERE...Taylor County. * WHEN...From 3 PM CST Saturday to 1 AM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be slippery to hazardous.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Visit 511wi.gov for road conditions.
